recommended_actions.description: R session note quality: 3/5 recent R sessions have truncated/non-completion-format notes (s1368, s1358, s1275). These sessions do work but don't output the 'Session R#NNN complete.' marker that the summarize hook captures. This creates blind spots when reviewing R session effectiveness.
